name: icalendar-life-work-sync
description: Office365 Outlook / Microsoft Teams Calendar <--> iCalendar *.ics Sync App

scripts.setup: echo '*** Setup Life-Work Calendar Sync ...' && cp x.gitignore .gitignore && cp x.hintrc .hintrc && git pull && npm install && ./node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs -o ./xyz.dist__bookmarklet-src.min.js --compress --mangle -- ./outlook-teams-company-events-to-icalendar-sync.js && echo '*** done.' && exit 1
scripts.build: echo '*** Build Bookmarklet: Life-Work Calendar Sync ...' && node script.bookmarklet.js && echo '*** done.' && exit 1
